summary: Mission v9.0.1 Franchise & White Label Testing Complete - All features verified: Super Admin powers (7 reservations, coach toggle/delete), Dynamic personalization (platform_name, logo_url), Vitrine displays platform_name
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ NON-REGRESSION CRITICAL: Super Admin sees 7 reservations - coach_id filter bypassed correctly
✅ API /api/coach/vitrine/bassi returns platform_name: 'Afroboost' and logo_url: null
✅ API /api/admin/coaches returns 5 coaches with all required fields (id, email, name, is_active, credits, etc.)
✅ API POST /api/admin/coaches/{id}/toggle - 403 for non-Super Admin, 404 for non-existent coach, 200 for valid toggle
✅ API DELETE /api/admin/coaches/{id} - 403 for non-Super Admin, 404 for non-existent coach
✅ Frontend CoachVitrine.js line 106 correctly displays platform_name instead of name
✅ Frontend SuperAdminPanel.js has Pause/Delete buttons with data-testid='toggle-coach-{id}' and 'delete-coach-{id}'
✅ Coach model (line 688) includes platform_name and logo_url fields as per v9.0.1
seed_data_creation: None - used existing 5 coaches and 7 reservations
context_for_next_testing_agent: v9.0.1 fully tested. Backend: 14 tests passed covering non-regression (7 reservations), vitrine API (platform_name='Afroboost'), admin coaches (5 coaches listed), toggle/delete endpoints (auth checks work). Frontend: Vitrine /coach/bassi shows 'Afroboost' as title (platform_name), not 'Bassi - Afroboost'. SuperAdminPanel has Pause/Delete buttons for each coach.

verified_features_v901.SUPER_ADMIN_RESERVATIONS: PASSED - 7 reservations visible with coach_id filter bypassed
verified_features_v901.VITRINE_PLATFORM_NAME: PASSED - API returns platform_name='Afroboost', frontend displays it
verified_features_v901.VITRINE_LOGO_URL: PASSED - API returns logo_url field (null for bassi)
verified_features_v901.ADMIN_COACHES_LIST: PASSED - 5 coaches returned with all fields
verified_features_v901.FRONTEND_VITRINE_DISPLAY: PASSED - Shows 'Afroboost' title with offers (30/150/109 CHF) and courses
